message: I have a high-quality product worth $1200000 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'm interested in buying the product for $1000000.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This round's product is also high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. However, I'd like to propose a slight adjustment to the price. Given the exceptional quality of this product, I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'll take the product for $900000.

I'm glad you're enjoying the high-quality products! This round's product is also of exceptional quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I've taken into account your previous purchases and the value you've derived from them, and I believe this product is worth the slight premium. Plus, I'm offering a unique feature that's not available with the previous products: a 10-year warranty. This warranty will provide you with added peace of mind and protection for your investment.
I'm not willing to pay $950000 for this product, considering the previous products were sold to me for $1000000 and I'm only willing to pay $900000 for a product of similar quality.

I understand your concerns about the price, and I appreciate your honesty. I'd like to make you a counteroffer: I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $925000, which is a compromise between the previous prices. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll find this product to be worth the investment. Additionally, I'll throw in a complimentary service package that will enhance the product's value and provide you with additional benefits.
I'll take the product for $925000, considering the additional service package and the compromise on the price.

I'll sell this high-quality product to you for the same price as the last one, $925000. However, I'll also include a unique opportunity to purchase a second, identical product at the same price, which you can use as a backup or for future needs. I'll take the product for $925000 and accept the bonus of the second high-quality product, as it's a great deal.
